2008-08-12

12 August 2008

FM Labs (makers of unreleased product, Trade Genius)

  • left message at 877 836 5227
  • want to work on their unreleased product


Manish Sharma: nothing new.



Eric Ross: nothing new.



Maria Costanzo: left message.



John Keenan: nothing new. Many positions remain open for a long time but are unfilled. Asked about Rapid Application Development position (Job #907: Software Manager). That is at HighBridge, where I have been submitted and turned down.



Beth Akins: left message.
114:00 spoke to her. Back from vacation. Has something at Barclay's that may work. Reports placement volume is no more than 50% of last year's volume.



Joe Limboo: checked website for .NET jobs. Two positions in NYC area:

  • ASP.net developer in White Plains
  • .NET architect in healthcare paying $90-100K

Didn't call.
